price: 62. Y él ha extraviado a muchas generaciones de ustedes; ¿es que no razonan?”.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
